Getting a #COVID19 vaccine is the best way to help prevent COVID-19, especially severe illness and death. Get vaccinated today:

💻Search https://t.co/2akIUZiFIL 
📱 Text your ZIP code to 438829
📞Call 1-800-232-0233 https://t.co/ELcjN1rbtM
text_en: Getting a vaccine is the best way to help prevent COVID-19, especially severe illness and death. Get vaccinated today: Search Text your ZIP code to Call -800-232-0233
